name: Overlap
headline: Multimodal AI agents for video
description:
Overlap builds multimodal AI agents that can do literally anything you want related to video, such as finding specific moments, generating clips, or analyzing your video library. 

What takes media companies thousands of hours, we do in seconds.
generated_description:
**Company Overview: Overlap**

**Mission:**  
Overlap aims to revolutionize video processing with its multimodal AI agents designed to handle all aspects of video management—whether it's locating specific moments, generating clips, or performing detailed analyses of video libraries.

**Foundation and Location:**  
Founded recently and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Overlap is based in San Francisco, California. It operates with a lean team of just three employees, all positioned to make significant strides in media technology.

**Product Offering:**  
Overlap's flagship product, Overlap Studio, is a fully autonomous video editor. This tool leverages advanced AI models to perform tasks traditionally requiring thousands of man-hours in mere seconds. Users can efficiently extract meaningful clips from longer videos and generate content suited for social media—all tailored to their style. 

**Impact Statistics:**  
The results? Over 50 million new impressions for users, utilized in over 160 countries, with more than 85% of users reporting increased engagement. This level of optimization in video editing not only enhances creativity but also significantly boosts productivity in content creation.

**Tech and Innovation:**  
The company's technology is built on OpenAI's state-of-the-art o3 model, establishing Overlap as a pioneer in developing the world's first Video Understanding Model. This model excels in various functions—from semantic search to video transformation—making complex video tasks accessible to creators everywhere.

**Notable Support:**  
Garry Tan, a prominent figure as Y Combinator's Group Partner and CEO, champions Overlap as "the world's best clipping tool," validating its effectiveness and the profound impact it has on video creators.

**Engagement and Outreach:**  
Overlap encourages potential users and collaborators to explore their offerings through an intuitive website that provides demonstrations, pricing information, and avenues for direct engagement with the founders.

For anyone involved in video content creation—be it media companies, podcasters, or individual creators—Overlap presents an exciting opportunity to drastically streamline their workflow while enhancing the quality of output. You can find more information at [joinoverlap.com](https://www.joinoverlap.com/).
